title: Any reason why this happens?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: It happened in my first 2 games after I got it from the service, now I'm off to the third, maybe it won't happen again. It goes away after I alt tab and look again.

replies.body: Yeah, I've seen this happening for a few players but not to worry, it's just a display issue!  The loading screen will connect to the game server as normal, but might just take a moment to load all the assets.  I don't have any updates on a fix right now, but the report is appreciated!
It's just slightly annoying, makes me wonder if my PC is retarded, that's all.
Been doing it for me recently, I just leave it and it loads straight into the game.
